topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5524902e6368722a30240200#post_5524902e6368722a30240200
Oh speaking of which; I remember reading something in forbes about this.

Essentially the reason why in the long run China is probably going to eventually stagnate is that everyone wants to move here, but not everyone can.  Apparently people want to move here so badly that the Chinese government is paying business owners and people of wealth *NOT* to move here cause it's hard to maintain your wealth over there.  It's not just millionaires, but doctors, programmers, technicians, engineers or such; the second someone gets money they're out the door and heading to the usa.

Also think about how much money they're bringing with them.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

I don't think that is likely but it is possible.
